Hi everyone
I wrote a few weeks back that I had purchased this kanabo from ebay.
http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dllViewItem&rd=1&item=3758988410&ssP
ageName=STRK:MEWN:IT
It arrived early this week and I ma very pleased with it- as far as 
I can tell the age of the iron and wood is even and consistent with 
being several centuries old.  My problem now is research.  Out of 
all my books (which is a fair number) I have only one reference to 
this kind of weapon- in Arms and Armor of the Samurai by Hopson and 
Bottomley.  If anyone out there can assist me in finding further 
references, pictures or other info I would sincerely appreciate it.
Thanks for your time.
Kirk
